about_the_game:
Video greetings from developers to thank You for supporting the game.
Available for free for UnReal World Steam players.
The package currently contains seven videos, and more will follow in time.
detailed_description:
Video greetings from developers to thank You for supporting the game.
Available for free for UnReal World Steam players.
The package currently contains seven videos, and more will follow in time.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Possibility to view full HD .mp4 videos
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Possibility to view full HD .mp4 videos
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

name: UnReal World - Video greetings

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Possibility to view full HD .mp4 videos
  • DirectX: Version 9.0b
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

short_description: Video greetings from developers to thank You for supporting the game. Available for free for UnReal World Steam players. The package currently contains six videos, and more will follow in time.
